objects.css: border: 3px solid white; border-radius: 5px; background: linear-gradient(218deg, rgba(14,18,31,1) 10%, rgba(23,75,102,1) 90%)
background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color1) 1%, var(--color1) 1%); transform: translate(var(--x1), var(--y1)) scale(var(--scale1)); border: 1px solid white; border-radius: 5px
background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color2) 1%, var(--color2) 1%); transform: translate(var(--x2), var(--y2)) scale(var(--scale2)); border: 1px solid white; border-radius: 5px
background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color3) 1%, var(--color3) 1%); transform: translate(var(--x3), var(--y3)) scale(var(--scale3)); border: 1px solid white; border-radius: 5px

info.name: The Team II
info.attribution:
Original cards and board layout by https://www.reddit.com/user/inseend1, https://www.reddit.com/user/RaphaelAlvez and ArnoldSmith86. Released to public domain under CC0.

Cards based on assets from https://unsplash.com/license

Astronauts tokens based on asset https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/astronaut-helmet.html by Delapouite under CC BY 3.0

Further mission rule icons: https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/alien-stare.html and https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/stopwatch.html by Lorc under CC BY 3.0
info.description: Cooperative trick taking card game. Work together on mission tasks to ensure that certain tricks are taken by certain players, all while not revealing your hand.

special.6:
One player has to do all the tasks.
Discuss who.
special.8: No player can win 2 more nines than any other player.
special.10: The commander takes all tasks. They may also give them all to one other player of their choice. In the latter case communication is only allowed before the first trick.
special.12: No player may begin any trick with red or black.
special.13: The commander takes all tasks. They may also give them all to one other player of their choice. In the latter case communication is only allowed before the first trick.
special.19: The commander first takes the leftmost most difficult task.
special.21: At no point in the mission may one player have won 2 more cards with value '1' than any other player.
special.23: Communication is not allowed before the first trick. Whoever wins the first trick, has to have won more tricks than any other player at any point in the mission.
special.27: The yellow 5 has to be the last card in the last trick.
special.32:
Use these 4 tasks:

0 tricks
exactly 3 in a row
2 in a row
first and last

thenRoutine.value: If you do not want to play a timed (real-time) mission, set difficulty to ${timed.3} and communication to ${commText}.

comm1.css: border-radius:30%;font-size: 75px; font-weight: bold; color: black; border: none;

special.css: background: #55555550;color: white;padding:5px;box-sizing: border-box;border-radius: 10px; border: 1px solid white
special.text: If you do not want to play a timed (real-time) mission, set difficulty to 12 and communication to normal.

timed.css: border-radius:30%;font-size: 35px; font-weight: bold; color: black; border: none; line-height: 28px

5j18.text: A green box with a '6' references that specific card: the green 6. Rockets are black.

5j19.text:
Everyone may communicate but they cannot indicate whether it's the lowest, highest or only card.
The card still has to satisfy one of those criteria though.

5j20.text: There are two communication tokens less than players. As long as there's still a token left, anyone can communicate. One player can even take multiple tokens (even at the same time).

5j21.text: Grey cards indicate any of the four colors. Black rockets are not included.

5j22.text:
Discuss and distribute the tasks freely among all players.
The tasks do not have to be distributed evenly. One player could even take all of them.

5j25.text: Winning only certain trump cards is impossible if one player has all of them. These cards contain footnotes that tell you for which constellations you have to re-deal the cards.

5j26.text: Some tasks require you to win or begin a trick by playing a specific card.

5j27.text: Boxes that don't show a number are any or multiple cards of the shown color.

5j28.text: For predicting tricks, please use the button 'Predict'. Privately predicted tricks will be revealed after pressing a 'Take' button on the last trick.

5j29.text:
Four missions have a time limit.
The commander asks each player in turn. The first player to answer 'Yes' takes all tasks (the commander is last and has no choice).
For '2p' it continues until a second player says 'Yes' (last 2 have no choice). They then discuss and distribute the tasks.
Use the button 'Timer' before the first trick and any communication.
